DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the hypothesis that the HumaPen Memoir with memory function, when used over 24 weeks for prandial insulin injections achieves superior glycemic control, when compared to the conventional HumaPen Luxura without memory function.
DOC.brief_title: A Study on the Effect of 2 Pen Devices on HbA1c
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes mellitus receiving at least 3 prandial injections per day with shortacting or analogue insulin Insulin pump therapy receiving premixed insulin preparations
